title: Genesis team MTA funding request 04/02/21
body:
The mStable genesis team is requesting MTA tokens for the following purposes:

- 2591.6 MTA to be sent to 0x5Ed2a924cD735D725fCCa11180f7b682e614e70a in order to fund mStable's first grant to the HAL team (https://9000.hal.xyz) in order to build a twitter bot and "triggers" for the mStable protocol
- 45,000 MTA to be sent to 0x87a4f91dfc400b44BCAe04f7025789642aF85611 to fund token allocations for new team members who joined the gensis team in February.

Is this request approved?
author: 0x4B37BbC8CAb32aade27Ce8b1bb2A9E614de81E03
